channel.title: 667 disable move when trading?
channel.description: Yeh, The problem is that if two players trade with each other and one of the players moves, the trade window closes for the one that moves but not for the other player. The same thing happens if one player iths the "x" in the top right corner . If you know how to fix this or how to disable moving/clicking the"X" in trade plz reply =]. Also intressted if some1 knows how to fix right-click trade.

man, i can’t fugure this out

item.title: 667 disable move when trading?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Inside the walking packet add a check.

if (player.isInTrade()) {
    return;
}

This will not work, it is simply an example.

Read full topic

item.title: 667 disable move when trading?

@z0da wrote:

Yeh, The problem is that if two players trade with each other and one of the players moves, the trade window closes for the one that moves but not for the other player. The same thing happens if one player iths the “x” in the top right corner . If you know how to fix this or how to disable moving/clicking the"X" in trade plz reply =]. Also intressted if some1 knows how to fix right-click trade.
